tool_description: Easily create your own business cards in seconds, using high-quality professional designs, then save them as PNG, JPG, HTML, or JSON.
title: Business Card Maker

api_list.name: /api/business-card/{fromat}

required_parameters.name: fromat
required_parameters.description:
Response data format.
**formats:**

- json
- html
- jpg
- png

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://business-card-maker.p.rapidapi.com/api/business-card/{fromat}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "business-card-maker.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
